amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to carry out reductions to the nuclear forces of the United States to implement the New START Treaty (as defined in section 495(e) of title 10, United States Code).
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 58 printed in House Report 113-170 to provide that none of the funds made available by this act may be used to carry out reductions to the nuclear forces of the United States to implement the New START Treaty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Rogers (AL).
